## Handling Transcript Processing Errors (Python)

```python
try:
    agent.process_transcript("input.txt")
except TranscriptError as e:
    print(f"Error: {e}")
    print(f"Suggested fix: {e.suggestion}")
    print(f"Recovery path: {e.recovery_options}")
```

## Processing Commands for Transcript Agent (Python)

```python
# Format a transcript
agent.format("input_transcript.txt")

# Repair transcription errors
agent.repair("formatted_text.txt")

# Generate summary
agent.summarize("repaired_text.txt", constraint_type="time", value=90)
```

## Module Processing Pipeline - Plaintext

```Plaintext
Stage 1: natural-formatting.md

Stage 3: summary-function.md
```

## Recovering from Errors and Optimizing Prompts (Bash)

```bash
# Repair structure issues
repair-structure --auto

# Optimize density
optimize-density path/to/prompt.txt

# Rebalance distribution
rebalance-tokens path/to/prompt.txt
```

## Configuring System Settings (YAML)

```yaml
formatting:
  paragraph_gap: 8  # seconds
  line_gap: 4      # seconds

repair:
  confidence_threshold: 90  # percentage
  context_window: 5        # words

summary:
  default_speaking_pace: 150  # words per minute
```
